nodes.text: The Imperial Transfer Post was a location near Kuat. It was one of three spaceports that bordered the Inner Kuat Transfer Zone during the time of the Galactic Empire.

This space station was reserved for Imperial use only, leading to trespassers being automatically targeted. In 2 ABY it was the site of a commissioning ceremony for the Executor, attended by Emperor Palpatine; Darth Vader; Grand Admiral Rufaan Tigellinus; and Admirals Thrawn, Tandres, Tavares, and Kendal Ozzel.
